SEARCH
Package main.controller.request

Class SuggestionManager

java.lang.Object
main.controller.request.SuggestionManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
RequestManager
public class SuggestionManager extends Object implements RequestManager
This class defines all the functions for staff to manage all the suggestions submitted for their camps
